name: PeaSoup Hosting
description:
PeaSoup Hosting is a disruptive cloud company focussing on delivering innovative and top-quality assisted cloud services:
infrastructure as a service (IaaS)
backup as a service (BaaS/BRaaS)
disaster recovery as a service (DRaaS)
 
The PeaSoup cloud uses a hyper-converged infrastructure and the company was the first in Europe to use this cloud architecture.
 
PeaSoup focuses on the environmental controls around the servers in the datacentres delivering an “ecological” cloud infrastructure using immersive technology.
